title: Multimodal Learning Station Design for Early Childhood Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic math concepts and general knowledge of early childhood developmental stages
context.additional_context: Design of early childhood mathematics education methods using movement-based interactive games in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Design three or more early childhood number sense development activities through multimodal learning station design.

Learners can create two math education scenarios for young children (ages 5â€“7) using smartphone-based motion interaction games (e.g., AR number jump, touch arithmetic puzzles) and submit practical outcomes that score 4+ (16+ out of 20 points) on a 5-point rubric through peer evaluation.

resources: Smartphone and Simple Motion Sensor Device
